alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 9:23PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Rooks and southwestern Phillips Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 923 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Logan, or 11 miles west of Phillipsburg, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Rooks and southwestern Phillips Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
